set size ratio 1.0
set title "Flï¿½che der Staaten, Iteration: 10"
unset xtics
unset ytics
unset ytics
$data << EOD

plot \
'$data' using 1:2:3:5 with circles lc var notitle, \
'$data' using 1:2:4:5 with labels font "arial, 9" tc var notitle
